table.title: Authentication success and failure for accounts

search.query: | pivot Authentication Authentication count(Authentication) AS "Count of Authentication" SPLITROW app AS Application SPLITROW src_user AS User SPLITROW src AS Host SPLITCOL action FILTER src_user isNot unknown FILTER src is $src$ FILTER src_user is $user$ FILTER app is $app$ FILTER action isNot unknown SORT 100 app ROWSUMMARY 0 COLSUMMARY 0 NUMCOLS 100 SHOWOTHER 0 | rename failure AS Failure, success AS Success

table.title: Accounts authenticating to distinct hosts and total hosts

search.query: stats dc(Host) count(Host) by User | rename "dc(Host)" AS "Distinct Hosts", "count(Host)" AS "Host Count"
